testsuite.name: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: And I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: And Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: When enter Lesson name "Lesson without Submit"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: When I save & close the lesson on the design page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: Then I see summary of the lesson with warning text "WARNING: Empty section"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: When I save it anyway
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: And I click the breadcrumb to return to the class homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: And I click on the "Lesson without Submit" module in the "Student Readiness" unit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: Then the module "Lesson without Submit" is opened without launch page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: Then I do not see the "Submit Lesson" button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Do not enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is not present

testsuite.system-out: @Lesson @LessonEditor Scenario: Enable the option Allow Submit and verify that Submit Lesson is present ?[90m# ManageLesson.feature:24?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32menter Lesson name "?[0m?[32m?[1mLesson with Submit?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.enterAssignmentName(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click on the Properties tab?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorSteps.clickPropertiesTab()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI enable the option "Allow Submit"?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorPropertiesSteps.enableAllowSubmit()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI save & close the lesson on the properties page?[0m ?[90m# LessonEditorPropertiesSteps.saveAndCloseLesson()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see summary of the lesson with warning text "?[0m?[32m?[1mWARNING: Empty section?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.assertNoQuestionsInAssignmentWarningMessageIsDisplayed(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI save it anyway?[0m ?[90m# AssignmentEditorDetailsSteps.saveAssignmentAnyway()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click the breadcrumb to return to the class homepage?[0m ?[90m# PageLoadingSteps.returnToClassHomepage()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click on the "?[0m?[32m?[1mLesson with Submit?[0m?[32m" module in the "?[0m?[32m?[1mStudent Readiness?[0m?[32m" unit?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.clickOnModuleLink(String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mthe module "?[0m?[32m?[1mLesson with Submit?[0m?[32m" is opened without launch page?[0m ?[90m# ClassHomepageSteps.switchToModulePage(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the "Submit Lesson" button?[0m ?[90m# LessonSteps.assertSubmitLessonButtonVisible()?[0m
